name: glassdoor_scrape_interviews
description: Scrape interview experiences from Glassdoor for a company. Returns up to 15 interview entries with job title, experience rating, difficulty, question samples, date, and outcome.

steps.label: Wait for interview data to load

steps.code: const interviews = []; const interviewEls = document.querySelectorAll('.interview-details, [data-test="interview-details"], .interviewReview, [id^="InterviewReview"], .empInterviews .empReview, .gdReview'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(interviewEls.length, 15); i++) { const intv = interviewEls[i]; const titleEl = intv.querySelector('.interviewTitle, [data-test="interview-title"], .reviewer-job-title, .reviewLink, h2 a, .interview-title'); const experienceEl = intv.querySelector('[data-test="interview-experience"], .interviewOutcomes .experience, [class*="interviewOutcome"], .interview-experience'); const difficultyEl = intv.querySelector('[data-test="interview-difficulty"], .interviewOutcomes .difficulty, [class*="interviewDifficulty"], .interview-difficulty'); const offerEl = intv.querySelector('[data-test="interview-offer"], .interviewOutcomes .offer, [class*="interviewOffer"], .interview-offer'); const dateEl = intv.querySelector('.interviewDate, [data-test="interview-date"], .reviewDate, time, .date, .authorInfo'); const descEl = intv.querySelector('.interviewDetails, [data-test="interview-description"], .interview-body, .mainText, [class*="interviewDetails"], p.mt-0'); const questionsEl = intv.querySelector('.interviewQuestions, [data-test="interview-question"], .interview-questions, [class*="interviewQuestion"]'); const applicationEl = intv.querySelector('.applicationDetails, [data-test="application-details"], [class*="applicationDetails"]'); interviews.push({ job_title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', experience: experienceEl ? experienceEl.textContent.trim() : '', difficulty: difficultyEl ? difficultyEl.textContent.trim() : '', offer: offerEl ? offerEl.textContent.trim() : '', date: dateEl ? dateEl.textContent.trim() : '', description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().slice(0, 500) : '', questions: questionsEl ? questionsEl.textContent.trim().slice(0, 500) : '', application: applicationEl ? applicationEl.textContent.trim().slice(0, 300) : '' }); } const companyEl = document.querySelector('[data-test="employer-name"], .employer-name, h1'); return { company: companyEl ? companyEl.textContent.trim() : '', interview_count: interviews.length, interviews: interviews, interviews_url: window.location.href }
steps.name: interview_data
steps.label: Extract interview experiences
